alert.note: Alert for Andrew; Buchanan; Holt (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 04 at 4:28AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Doniphan, northeastern Buchanan, southeastern Holt and southwestern Andrew Counties through 500 AM CDT... At 427 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Troy, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... St. Joseph, Savannah, Wathena, Elwood, Highland, Troy, Country Club Villa, Country Club, Amazonia, Fillmore, Denton, Severance, St. Joseph Airport, Bendena and Fanning. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 46 and 69. Interstate 229 between mile markers 4 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
